intro: Zyrphelis ecklonis subsp. strictifolia, commonly known as the rigidleaf zyrphelis, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its upright, narrow leaves and showy yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. It is known for its compact growth habit and is often cultivated as an ornamental plant. Due to its specific habitat requirements, it is relatively rare in the wild.
